Help:
```asciidoc
= General Commands =
 .modmail-help :: Displays this help screen
 .sendcontact :: Sends the support contact message to the support channel
 .updatecontact :: Scans for and updates the support contact message to the current configuration
 .block [mention|userID] [hours] :: Blocks a user from creating new requests
 .unblock [mention|userID] :: Unblocks a user from creating new requests

= Ticket Handlers =
Must be sent as a reply to a ticket
 .resolve [remarks] :: Resolves a ticket
 .accept [remarks] :: Accepts a ticket
 .deny [remarks] :: Denies a ticket
 .close [remarks] :: Closes a ticket (should only be used for illegal or corrupted tickets)
```
